original_text: And of the Levites, Ahijah had charge of the treasuries of the house of God and the treasuries of the dedicated gifts.
korean_text: 레위 사람 중에 아히야는 하나님의 전 곳간과 성물 곳간을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: Ahijah had charge of the treasuries of the house of God
and the treasuries of the dedicated gifts.
